rules_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
Tap five untapped Deserts you control: This land becomes a 1/4 Sand Demon creature until your next end step. It’s still a land.
Whenever Mist-Marked Strand attacks, mill three cards. You may cast a spell with mana value 3 or less from among them without paying its mana cost.
